ghostPost.title: Today
ghostPost.excerpt:
I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track
again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also
supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything
new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but
want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the
day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead
like a leaky boat. I
ghostPost.plaintext:
I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track
again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also
supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything
new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but
want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the
day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead
like a leaky boat. I came when everyone started to leave. I'm not sure why. But
does it matter. Just tried to record a voice for this track again and again ..
ghostPost.html: I woke up and felt like a gloomy sky. I tried to record a voice for this track again and again. I was invited to the birthday party. But some people are also supposed to be there, whom I may know. So I'm confused and don't want anything new. Being around people is difficult at times like this. Was asked to come, but want to say no. May be I should isolate and practice some confidence. But as the day goes I feel a bit better. So I decided to make a short visit and swam ahead like a leaky boat. I came when everyone started to leave. I'm not sure why. But does it matter. Just tried to record a voice for this track again and again ..
